attributes.action: ensure fines do not go to the body that imposes them, but to unrelated good causes instead.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We support the principle that a fine should be to penalise a certain behaviour rather than develop an income stream for the imposing body.They must not benfit from the fine.It is more acceptable to the people of this country to put fines into good causes.We would then be sure it is to deter behaviour,not for the love of money/an income stream/stealth tax.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
